title: Tater Tot Casserole Recipe (with Video)
description: This Tater Tot casserole is easy to make with ground beef, cream of mushroom soup, and lots of Cheddar cheese for a tasty comfort food classic.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Main Dishes Casserole Recipes Vegetable Tater Tots® Tater Tot Casserole 4.5 (763) 653 Reviews 133 Photos This Tater Tot casserole is a quick and easy dinner that everyone will love. Just four basic ingredients come together for this comforting dish. Submitted by barryzimm Updated on October 10, 2024 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 133 133 133 133 Prep Time: 5 mins Cook Time: 40 mins Total Time: 45 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Jump to recipe This tater tot casserole recipe is quick, easy, and incredibly satisfying. Made with simple and cheap ingredients, it's sure to please everyone at your dinner table. Tater Tot Casserole Ingredients These are the ingredients you'll need to make this tater tot recipe: · Beef: This tater tot casserole starts with ground beef cooked until it's brown and crumbly.· Canned soup: A can of condensed cream of mushroom soup adds richness, creaminess, and flavor.· Seasonings: This casserole is simply seasoned with salt and black pepper.· Tater tots: Of course, you'll need frozen tater tots!· Cheese: Shred your own Cheddar cheese for the most delicious results. How to Make Tater Tot Casserole Here's a very brief overview of what you can expect when you make tater tot casserole at home: 1. Cook the ground beef, then stir in the soup and seasonings.2. Transfer the beef to a baking dish. Top with tater tots, then the cheese.3. Bake until the tots are golden brown. How to Store Tater Tot Casserole Store the leftover tater tot casserole in a shallow, airtight container for up to five days. Reheat thoroughly in the oven or in the microwave. Can You Freeze Tater Tot Casserole? Yes, you can freeze tater tot casserole – but it's best to freeze it before cooking. Assemble the casserole according to the recipe but, instead of baking it, wrap the whole thing in storage wrap. Wrap it again in aluminum foil. Freeze the casserole for up to four months, then bake it according to the recipe. Add a few minutes to the cook time to account for the freezing temperature. Allrecipes Community Tips and Praise "Delicious," raves Lori Hankins Carter. "I added onion rings (the kind on green bean casserole) and mixed it with the tater tots. Really good!" "My husband and son eat this like they've been starving for weeks," says one Allrecipes community member. "Leftovers don't last long. I substituted cream of onion soup for the cream of mushroom and we found we liked it even better!" "I love this quick, easy meal," according to Misti Fletcher. "I add the frozen seasoning blend when cooking the ground beef (onion, bell pepper, etc.) and sometimes add corn to make it a complete meal." Editorial contributions by Corey Williams. Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 1 pound ground beef 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup salt and ground black pepper to taste 1 (16 ounce) package frozen tater tots 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese Directions Gather the ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). ALLRECIPES/VICTORIA JEMPTY Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir ground beef in the hot skillet until completely browned and crumbly, 7 to 10 minutes. Stir in condensed soup; season with salt and black pepper. ALLRECIPES/VICTORIA JEMPTY Transfer beef mixture to a 9x13-inch baking dish; layer tater tots evenly on top and sprinkle with Cheddar cheese. ALLRECIPES/VICTORIA JEMPTY Bake in the preheated oven until tater tots are golden brown and hot, 30 to 45 minutes. ALLRECIPES/VICTORIA JEMPTY Serve and enjoy! ALLRECIPES/VICTORIA JEMPTY I Made It Print 1,266 home cooks made it! Add Your Photo Photos of Tater Tot Casserole 01 of 133 Photo by  ALLRECIPES/VICTORIA JEMPTY 02 of 133 Photo by  Gina Stevens 04/01/2025 A keeper! Great flavors Easy to follow Worth the effort Crowd-pleaser I added minced onions and 2 cloves of garlic some pink Himalayan salt as well as soul food seasoning. I also added 4 cheese taco cheese. All cheese products came from Cabot creamy since my grown kids work there. Wasn't sure adding mushroom soup but what a surprise could not really taste it. This meal was a pleasant surprise. Very delicious. Will make again. Yummy 😋 03 of 133 Photo by  Jen Steffen 01/25/2025 This is a great base recipe. Upgrade it as much as you like, add what you want to, and make it your own. I added some onion, mixed veggies, as well as salt and pepper. I added half a can of milk with the soup and about half a cup of sour cream. It was so tasty, definitely a keeper 04 of 133 Photo by  Sherra Danielson 01/22/2025 Worth the effort Just made it added my own little touch I used2 pounds of elk burger, Sautéed it with minced garlic and seasoned it with lemon pepper and Montreal chicken seasoning then Mixed it with Two small cans of cream of mushroom soup, small Can of Cream of chicken soup, and topped the meat mixture with green beans, then tater tots then the bake and melt cheese And the fiesta cheese blend from Walmart. And topped it with fresh cracked pepper… Cooked it for 40 minutes in the oven at 355° and it came out awesome other than I should have topped the green beans with cheese before I put the tater tots on.. It still came out great though definitely an easy hearty meal 05 of 133 Photo by  JoanneH 01/06/2025 Easy to follow Worth the effort 06 of 133 Photo by  J Edwards 12/03/2024 Might try again Flavor was ok. I sprinkled dried minced onion, garlic powder, salt and pepper on the ground beef as it was browning and then stirred in the can of soup. It seemed dry. I think my mom used to make this, but she added a soup can of milk to the mixture. 07 of 133 Photo by  Cordale Montgomery 11/13/2024 A keeper! Great flavors Easy to follow For all the single folks out there, the recipe instructions are quick and easy. I highly recommend it to anyone who loves ground beef and Tater Tots. I got a little creative and added a medley of onions, green peppers, and red peppers to ground beef. ooo la la... 08 of 133 Photo by  Angie Lindsey 09/01/2024 OK with tweaks I added onions, celery, peppers and garlic when sauteing the meat. I added corn as suggested and spread cheese over the casserole before adding the tater tots and then again over the top. To me I found it a bit boring. Very Midwest. My husband LOVED it.... 09 of 133 Photo by  Mona Linda Villegas 06/02/2024 A keeper! Easy to follow Family favorite My kids love this dish. When I ask what should I make for dinner, they always say tater tot casserole. 10 of 133 Photo by  SnazzyCrisp2935 03/10/2024 A keeper! Great flavors Easy to follow Crowd-pleaser Worth the effort Family favorite This recipe is very yummy , after the hamburger mushroom soup mixture, I added French style green beans, then I did Campbell's cheddar cheese soup over the green beans and next my tater tots. I prefer that over the shredded cheese, how it's more creamy, finally sprinkle with a dash season salt and black pepper. 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love 9 Family-Friendly Tater Tot Casseroles Green Bean Tater Tot Casserole 233 Ratings Cheeseburger Tater Tot Casserole 21 Ratings Quick and Easy Tater Tot Casserole 213 Ratings Fiesta Tater Tot Casserole 43 Ratings Tater Tots Casserole 365 Ratings Savory Tater Tot Casserole 340 Ratings Tater Tot Hot Dish II 238 Ratings Vegetarian Tater Tot Casserole 417 Ratings Easy Tater Tot Casserole 120 Ratings Yummy Tater Tot Casserole 127 Ratings Creamy Tater Tot Casserole 230 Ratings Cheesy Bacon, Ham, and Swiss Tater Tots Poutine 5 Ratings Cowboy Casserole 46 Ratings Chicken Bacon Ranch Tater Tot Casserole 7 Ratings Buffalo Chicken Tater Tot Casserole 5 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
